name: Commercial Elec. WH, 90.1 c. 2019 (FS)

market_entry_year_source.notes: Corresponds to the first year in the table for cost and performance of commercial electric resistance storage water heaters

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

energy_efficiency_source.notes: Based on comments in EIA cost and performance file regarding typical minimum thermal efficiency of currently available electric resistance storage WH units

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

installed_cost_source.notes: Median of standard efficiency installed cost in 2017, divided by (18 kW * (3.412 kBtu/h/kW)), based on 18 kW input capacity per EIA data

_description: Electric resistance storage water heater for commercial buildings
